eventak

Class Party

  • java.lang.Object
    • eventak.Event
      • eventak.Party

  • public class Party
extends Event

    Create, and manage, a Party (private party, wedding, etc)

    This class is one of the subclasses of Event, and should be directly accessible to main/user/etc. Apart from the default methods and attributes of Event, it has: - "Highlighted person(s)" (Bride, groom, etc) - "Entertainment" (DJ, show, etc) - "Type" (Wedding, birthday party, etc)
